channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews

item.title: 7/19: CBS Weekend News
item.description: Driver crashes into line of people in L.A., police say he was shot; Artist creates massive designs, visible only until the tide rolls in

item.title: Vehicle plows into Los Angeles crowd, injuring 30 people
item.description: A driver drove into a crowd in East Hollywood, injuring 30 people, according to the Los Angeles Fire Department. Police believe the crash was an inten...

item.title: 21st century technology used to help solve Wisconsin mom's murder
item.description: A man suspected in his girlfriend's murder swears he didn't do it – can his Fitbit prove he's innocent?

item.title: Did goofy talk between a couple mimicking cartoon characters lead to murder?
item.description: Linda Duffey shot her husband Patrick in their suburban California home — that is clear. What's not so clear is what led up to the shooting.

item.title: Number of missing in Texas floods drops from nearly 100 to 3 in hard-hit county
item.description: In a statement Saturday, county officials cited "extensive follow-up work among state and local agencies."

item.title: 3 people are still missing from deadly July 4 floods in Texas county, down from nearly 100

item.title: New airport scanners are better at spotting liquid explosives, but many airports lack them
Car strikes crowd outside Los Angeles venue, injuring 30. Bystanders attack driver, who was shot
item.description: At least three people were in critical condition after being injured along Santa Monica Boulevard in East Hollywood.

item.title: Florida Rep. Joe Casello dies while in office
item.description: Florida Democratic lawmaker Joe Casello has died while in office following a heart attack

item.title: WATCH: "The Lost Stuffy Project" reunites kids with stuffed animals lost in flooding
item.description: A nonprofit is helping to reunite children with their "lost" stuffed animals following the July 4 floods in Central Texas.

item.title: WATCH: President Trump signs first major federal cryptocurrency bill into law
item.description: The bill outlines regulations aimed at making a specific kind of digital currency called stablecoins more accessible and mainstream.
